triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: DialoGPT addresses the core problem of building dialogue systems for conversational response generation.

triples.name: Generative pre-trained transformer
triples.relevance: The paper proposes DialoGPT, a new generative pre-trained transformer specifically designed for conversational response generation.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Conversational response generation is a fundamental natural language processing task that the paper addresses.

triples.name: Transformer (deep learning architecture)
triples.relevance: DialoGPT is built on the transformer architecture, which enables efficient processing of conversational sequences.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: DialoGPT is a large-scale generative model that represents an advancement in large language models for dialogue tasks.
